get a personalized skincare routine

We make achieving your skin goals easy. Take our Skin Quiz & find the perfect, probiotic extract-packed routine—expertly customized just for you.

our vision is to inspire confidence

We encourage skin positivity & approach beauty from the inside out™. Our photos are stamped with “Unretouched Beauty” badges, because we believe in realistic skin standards and complexions of all kinds. #EmbraceYourSkin

why probiotic extracts in skincare?

TULA founder and gastroenterologist, Dr. Roshini Raj, had a lightbulb moment when she realized probiotic extracts could be a breakthrough innovation in skincare.
